name: Raft vs Shark
description:
You are a pirate and your crew left you alone on a desert island. After 365 days, you are ready to go to sea with a raft you’ve built. But the sea is dangerous and the sharks are hungry !

 Don’t forget to repair your raft or you’ll be their meal !

How to control the player ?

Move with the  arrow keys. 

Click on water around you to re-build the raft.
